overview: Michael has been the CEO and General Manager of StumbleUpon since April of 2007. Michael’s experience includes leading part of eBay Inc’s Corporate Strategy team where his focus was on consumer internet strategy and leading a number of Product Management teams in the eBay Marketplace. Prior to joining eBay, he worked at Palm, leading their business product and marketing teams, and at Lipstream Networks leading their marketing, product and business development teams.
